TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1306
TEI.2.document_title: James Small to Stephen F. Austin, 04-06-1826

barker_notes.barker_summary: James Small to Austin, April 6, 1826. Deposition concerning loss of $20.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1306

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*James Small to Austin, April 6, 1826. Deposition concerning loss of $20.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="04-06-1825">This day*/date_mentioned* personally appeared before me *person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin Judge*/person_mentioned* of this *location_mentioned*Jurisdiction */location_mentioned**person_mentioned*James Small*/person_mentioned* who being sworn deposeth and testi[fí]eth that he was in possession of a certain certificate a *location_mentioned*land office*/location_mentioned* bill drawn in favor of *person_mentioned*Oliver Jones*/person_mentioned* by *person_mentioned*Sam M Williams*/person_mentioned* in behalf of the *person_mentioned*Empresario Austin*/person_mentioned* for twenty dollars, which bill was washed to pieces in the pocket of his clothes and entirely destroyed, further deposes he has never recd value for the same or any part thereof.*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="04-06-1826">6th April 1826*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p**person_mentioned*James Small */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p* *p*Sworn to before me*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*[On reverse] Recd of *person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned* a receipt for twenty dollars in place of the within described that was lost*/p*.
*p**person_mentioned*James Small*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p* *p*[On margin] *person_mentioned*James Small*/person_mentioned* receipt*/p*
*/div1*
